thm opth1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
} = {
  syl(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wcel(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3)))
  syl5eleq(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3), cop(c0, c1), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)))
  opi1(c0, c1)
  id(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)))
  mpjaod(wcel(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(csn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(csn(c0), cpr(c2, c3)))
  a1i(wcel(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3)), wi(wceq(csn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(c0, c2)))
  sneqr(c0, c2)
  syl6(wcel(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3)), wceq(csn(c0), cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wcel(c2, csn(c0)))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3)), wceq(csn(c0), cpr(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(c2, cpr(c2, c3)))
  syl(wcel(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, cpr(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, universe))
  simpld(wcel(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  prid1g(c2, universe, c3)
  eleq2(csn(c0), cpr(c2, c3), c2)
  eqcomd(c0, c2, wcel(c2, csn(c0)))
  elsni(c2, c0)
  syl(wcel(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3)), wo(wceq(csn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(csn(c0), cpr(c2, c3))), wcel(csn(c0), cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c2, c3))))
  eleqtrd(csn(c0), cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c2, c3)), cop(c2, c3), wcel(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3)))
  id(wcel(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3)))
  syl(wcel(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3)), wceq(cop(c2, c3), cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c2, c3))), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  oprcl(csn(c0), c2, c3)
  dfopg(c2, universe, c3, universe)
  elpri(csn(c0), csn(c2), cpr(c2, c3))
}

blocks.name: opth
blocks.content: The ordered pair theorem. If two ordered pairs are equal, their first elements are equal and their second elements are equal. Exercise 6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 16. Note that ` C ` and ` D ` are not required to be sets due our specific ordered pair definition. (Contributed by NM, 28-May-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm opth(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
} = {
  impbii(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  jca(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))
  sylc(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), wceq(c1, c3), wcel(c3, universe), wceq(cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, c3)))
  simprd(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), wceq(cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c2, c1)), cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c2, c3))))
  eqtr3d(cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c2, c1)), cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c2, c3)), cop(c2, c3), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)))
  eqtr3d(cop(c2, c3), cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c2, c1)), cop(c2, c1), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)))
  eqtr3d(cop(c2, c1), cop(c2, c3), cop(c0, c1), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)))
  opeq1d(c0, c1, c2, wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)))
  opth1(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  sylancl(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), wceq(cop(c2, c1), cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c2, c1))), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  simpld(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  dfopg(c2, universe, c1, universe)
  syl(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), wceq(cop(c2, c3), cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c2, c3))), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  syl(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wcel(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3)))
  syl5eleq(csn(c0), cop(c2, c3), cop(c0, c1), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)))
  opi1(c0, c1)
  id(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)))
  oprcl(csn(c0), c2, c3)
  dfopg(c2, universe, c3, universe)
  preqr2(csn(c2), cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, c3))
  prex(c2, c1)
  prex(c2, c3)
  vtoclg(hs0, c3, universe, wi(wceq(cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c1, c3)), wi(wceq(cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(c1, cv(hs0))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c1, c3))
  eqeq2d(cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, cv(hs0)), cpr(c2, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  preq2(cv(hs0), c3, c2)
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c3, c1)
  preqr2(c2, c1, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  opeq12(c0, c2, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wceq(cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c1, c3)))
}

blocks.name: opthg
blocks.content: Ordered pair theorem. ` C ` and ` D ` are not required to be sets under our specific ordered pair definition. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)

thm opthg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5))))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wb(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5))), wb(wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(c4, c5)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c5))), wb(wceq(cop(c0, cv(hs1)), cop(c4, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c5))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(c4, c5)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c5)), wceq(cop(c0, cv(hs1)), cop(c4, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c5)))
  eqeq1d(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(c4, c5), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c5), wceq(c0, c4))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, c4)
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cop(c0, cv(hs1)), cop(c4, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c5)), wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)))
  eqeq1d(cop(c0, cv(hs1)), cop(c4, c5), cop(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  opeq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(c0, c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c5), wceq(c2, c5))
  eqeq1(cv(hs1), c2, c5)
  opth(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c4, c5)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wb(wceq(cop(c0, cv(hs1)), cop(c4, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c5))))
  diff.hs1.w(wb(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opthg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(< c0, c2 > = < c4, c5 > ↔(c0 = c4 ∧ c2 = c5)))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (< c0, c2 > = < c4, c5 > ↔(c0 = c4 ∧ c2 = c5)), (< hs0, hs1 > = < c4, c5 > ↔(hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c5)), (< c0, hs1 > = < c4, c5 > ↔(c0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c5)))
  bibi12d(hs0 = c0, < hs0, hs1 > = < c4, c5 >, (hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c5), < c0, hs1 > = < c4, c5 >, (c0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c5))
  eqeq1d(< hs0, hs1 >, < c4, c5 >, < c0, hs1 >, hs0 = c0)
  opeq1(hs0, c0, hs1)
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, hs0 = c4, hs1 = c5, c0 = c4)
  eqeq1(hs0, c0, c4)
  bibi12d(hs1 = c2, < c0, hs1 > = < c4, c5 >, (c0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c5), < c0, c2 > = < c4, c5 >, (c0 = c4 ∧ c2 = c5))
  eqeq1d(< c0, hs1 >, < c4, c5 >, < c0, c2 >, hs1 = c2)
  opeq2(hs1, c2, c0)
  anbi2d(hs1 = c2, c0 = c4, hs1 = c5, c2 = c5)
  eqeq1(hs1, c2, c5)
  opth(hs0, hs1, c4, c5)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((< c0, hs1 > = < c4, c5 > ↔(c0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c5)))
  diff.hs1.w((< c0, c2 > = < c4, c5 > ↔(c0 = c4 ∧ c2 = c5)))
}

thm opthneg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wne(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5)), wo(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c5))))
} = {
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wne(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5)), wo(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c5)), wn(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5))))
  df-ne(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5))), wo(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c5)), wn(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5))))
  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(c4, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)))
  opthg(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  bitr4i(wn(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5))), wo(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c5)), wo(wn(wceq(c0, c4)), wn(wceq(c2, c5))))
  ianor(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5))
  orbi12i(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c5), wn(wceq(c0, c4)), wn(wceq(c2, c5)))
  df-ne(c0, c4)
  df-ne(c2, c5)
}

blocks.name: sbcop1
blocks.content: The proper substitution of an ordered pair for a setvar variable corresponds to a proper substitution of its first component. (Contributed by AV, 8-Apr-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbcop1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), w0), wsbc(s3, cop(cv(s0), cv(s2)), w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s3), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)

thm sbcop1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ([s0 / s1]w0 ↔[< s0, s2 > / s3]w1)
  ⊣ (s3 = < s1, s2 > →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
  ⊣ d(s2, w1)
  ⊣ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(([s0 / s1]w0 ↔[< s0, s2 > / s3]w1), d(s0, s2))
  a1ii(([s0 / s1]w0 ↔[< s0, s2 > / s3]w1), d(s2, w1))
  impbii([s0 / s1]w0, [< s0, s2 > / s3]w1)
  sylibr([s0 / s1]w0, [< s0, s2 > / s3]w1, ∀(s3,(s3 = < s0, s2 > → w1)))
  alrimiv(s3, [s0 / s1]w0, (s3 = < s0, s2 > → w1))
  sylbi([s0 / s1]w0, (s3 = < s0, s2 > → w1), ∃(s1,(s1 = s0 ∧ w0)))
  sbc5(s1, s0, w0)
  exlimiv(s1, (s1 = s0 ∧ w0), (s3 = < s0, s2 > → w1))
  imp(s1 = s0, w0, (s3 = < s0, s2 > → w1))
  com23(s1 = s0, w0, s3 = < s0, s2 >, w1)
  syl6bi(s1 = s0, s3 = < s0, s2 >, (w0 → w1), s3 = < s1, s2 >)
  biimprd(s3 = < s1, s2 >, w0, w1)
  sbc6(s3, < s0, s2 >, w1)
  opex(s0, s2)
  sylbi([< s0, s2 > / s3]w1, [s0 / s1]w0, ∃(s3,(s3 = < s0, s2 > ∧ w1)))
  sbc5(s3, < s0, s2 >, w1)
  exlimiv(s3, (s3 = < s0, s2 > ∧ w1), [s0 / s1]w0)
  sylibr((s3 = < s0, s2 > ∧ w1), [s0 / s1]w0, ∀(s1,(s1 = s0 → w0)))
  alrimiv(s1, (s3 = < s0, s2 > ∧ w1), (s1 = s0 → w0))
  imp(s3 = < s0, s2 >, w1, (s1 = s0 → w0))
  com3l(s3 = < s0, s2 >, w1, s1 = s0, w0)
  syl6bi(s1 = s0, s3 = < s0, s2 >, (w1 → w0), s3 = < s1, s2 >)
  eqeq2d(s3, < s0, s2 >, < s1, s2 >, s1 = s0)
  equcoms(s1, s0, < s0, s2 > = < s1, s2 >)
  opeq1(s0, s1, s2)
  biimpd(s3 = < s1, s2 >, w1, w0)
  sbc6(s1, s0, w0)
  vex(s0)
  diff.wsbc.s(s3, s1, s0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.wi.s(s1, s3 = < s0, s2 >, w1)
  diff.cop.s(s3, s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, s3 = < s0, s2 >, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s3, < s0, s2 >)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.cop.s(s1, s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}

  eupick(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), w0)))
  com12(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), w0)), w0)
  mpan(wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), w0)), wi(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), w0), weu(s1, wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1))))
  mpbi(weu(s1, wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1))), weu(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs1))))
  euequ(s1, hs1)
  eubii(s1, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)))
  equcom(s1, hs1)
  eupick(s1, wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), w0)
  imbi12d(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  bibi2d(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  2exbidv(s0, s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0), wa(wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))
  anbi1d(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, wceq(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  eqeq1(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  diff.cop.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: copsex2t
blocks.content: Closed theorem form of ~ copsex2g . (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2013.)

thm copsex2t(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1)))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3))), wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  impel(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1)))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3)), wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))))
  exlimd(s0, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1)))), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))), wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1))
  nfa1(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1))))
  nfbi(s0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1)
  nfe1(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))
  nfv(s0, w1)
  exlimd(s1, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1)))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1))
  nfa2(s1, s0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1)))
  nfbi(s1, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1)
  nfex(s1, s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))
  nfe1(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))
  nfv(s1, w1)
  ex(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1)))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1))
  bitr3d(wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1)))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1, w0)
  adantl(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1)))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  syl(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(c0, c1)))
  opeq12(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1), c1)
  eqcoms(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(c0, c1), wb(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  copsexg(s0, s1, cop(c0, c1), w0)
  imp(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1)))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1))
  2sp(s0, s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))), wa(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c1))))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c3), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  elisset(s0, c0, c2)
  elisset(s1, c1, c3)
  exdistrv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cop.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: copsex2g
blocks.content: Implicit substitution inference for ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 28-May-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm copsex2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  elisset(s0, c0, c1)
  elisset(s1, c2, c3)
  sylbir(wa(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c2))), wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))))
  exdistrv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  exlimi(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))), wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1))
  nfbi(s0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1)
  nfe1(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))
  nfv(s0, w1)
  exlimi(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1))
  nfbi(s1, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1)
  nfex(s1, s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))
  nfe1(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))
  nfv(s1, w1)
  bitr3d(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), w1, w0)
  syl(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wb(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(c0, c2)))
  opeq12(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1), c2)
  eqcoms(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(c0, c2), wb(w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  copsexg(s0, s1, cop(c0, c2), w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cop.s(s1, c0, c2)
}

blocks.content: An implicit substitution inference for 2 ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1995.)

thm copsex4g(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3))), wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cop(c4, c5), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), w0))))), w1))
  -| wi(wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
  -| diffsw(s3, w1)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cop(c4, c5), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), w0))))), w1, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5))), w0))))))
  4exbidv(s0, s1, s2, s3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3))), wa(wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cop(c4, c5), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), w0), wa(wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5))), w0))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3))), wb(wa(wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cop(c4, c5), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), w0), wa(wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5))), w0)))
  anbi1i(wa(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cop(c4, c5), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), w0, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5))))
  anbi12i(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cop(c4, c5), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5)))
  bitri(wceq(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(c0, c2)))
  eqcom(cop(c0, c2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  opth(cv(s0), cv(s1), c0, c2)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  bitri(wceq(cop(c4, c5), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5)), wceq(cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cop(c4, c5)))
  eqcom(cop(c4, c5), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
  opth(cv(s2), cv(s3), c4, c5)
  vex(s2)
  vex(s3)
  cgsex4g(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5))), w0, w1)
  id(wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(cv(s3), c5))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c4, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c5, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3)))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c4, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c5, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3)))
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c2, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c4, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c5, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s3, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3)))
  diff.wa.s(s3, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s3, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, c2, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s3, wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c5, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s3, c4, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, c5, c3)
}

blocks.name: 0nelop
blocks.content: A property of ordered pairs. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm 0nelop(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wn(wcel(emptycls, cop(c0, c1)))
} = {
  pm2.65i(wcel(emptycls, cop(c0, c1)), wo(wceq(emptycls, csn(c0)), wceq(emptycls, cpr(c0, c1))))
  syl(wcel(emptycls, cop(c0, c1)), wo(wceq(emptycls, csn(c0)), wceq(emptycls, cpr(c0, c1))), wcel(emptycls, cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))
  eleqtrd(emptycls, cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)), cop(c0, c1), wcel(emptycls, cop(c0, c1)))
  id(wcel(emptycls, cop(c0, c1)))
  syl(wcel(emptycls, cop(c0, c1)), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  dfopg(c0, universe, c1, universe)
  elpri(emptycls, csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))

blocks.name: propssopi
blocks.content: If a pair of ordered pairs is a subset of an ordered pair, their first components are equal. (Contributed by AV, 20-Sep-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 16-Jun-2022.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)
blocks.origin:
thm propssopi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wss(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), cop(c4, c5)), wceq(c0, c2))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wcel(c4, universe)
  -| wcel(c5, universe)
} = {
  sylbi(wss(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), cop(c4, c5)), wceq(c0, c2), wss(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), cpr(csn(c4), cpr(c4, c5))))
  sseq2i(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), cop(c4, c5), cpr(csn(c4), cpr(c4, c5)))
  sylbi(wss(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), cpr(csn(c4), cpr(c4, c5))), wceq(c0, c2), wo(wo(wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), emptycls), wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), csn(csn(c4)))), wo(wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), csn(cpr(c4, c5))), wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), cpr(csn(c4), cpr(c4, c5))))))
  sspr(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), csn(c4), cpr(c4, c5))
  jaoi(wo(wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), emptycls), wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), csn(csn(c4)))), wo(wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), csn(cpr(c4, c5))), wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), cpr(csn(c4), cpr(c4, c5)))), wceq(c0, c2))
  jaoi(wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), emptycls), wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), csn(csn(c4))), wceq(c0, c2))
  mpi(wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), emptycls), wceq(c0, c2), wne(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), emptycls))
  prnz(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3))
  eqneqall(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), emptycls, wceq(c0, c2))
  sylbi(wceq(cpr(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), csn(csn(c4))), wceq(c0, c2), wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(c2, c3)), wceq(cop(c2, c3), csn(c4))))

blocks.name: mosubopt
blocks.content: "At most one" remains true inside ordered pair quantification. (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm mosubopt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wmo(s2, w0))), wmo(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wmo(s2, w0))), wmo(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  pm2.61d1(wal(s0, wal(s1, wmo(s2, w0))), wmo(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  exlimd(s0, wal(s0, wal(s1, wmo(s2, w0))), wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wmo(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  nfa1(s0, wal(s1, wmo(s2, w0)))
  nfmo(s0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  nfe1(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))
  sps(s0, wal(s1, wmo(s2, w0)), wi(wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wmo(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))))
  exlimd(s1, wal(s1, wmo(s2, w0)), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wmo(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  nfa1(s1, wmo(s2, w0))
  nfmo(s1, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  nfex(s1, s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))
  nfe1(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))
  sps(s1, wmo(s2, w0), wi(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wmo(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))))
  biimpcd(wmo(s2, w0), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wmo(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  mobidv(s2, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  copsexg(s0, s1, c0, w0)
  syl(wn(wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wmo(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), wn(wex(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))))
  con3i(wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  exlimiv(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  2eximi(s0, s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0), wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  simpl(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)
  nexmo(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  diff.wex.s(s2, s0, wex(s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.wex.s(s2, s1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.cop.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: mosubop
blocks.content: "At most one" remains true inside ordered pair quantification. (Contributed by NM, 28-May-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm mosubop(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wmo(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w0))))
  -| wmo(s0, w0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  ax-mp(wmo(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w0)))), wal(s1, wal(s2, wmo(s0, w0))))
  gen2(s1, s2, wmo(s0, w0))
  mosubopt(s1, s2, s0, c0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mosubop(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ∃*(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(c0 = < s1, s2 > ∧ w0))))
  ⊣ ∃*(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  ax-mp(∃*(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(c0 = < s1, s2 > ∧ w0)))), ∀(s1, ∀(s2, ∃*(s0, w0))))
  gen2(s1, s2, ∃*(s0, w0))
  mosubopt(s1, s2, s0, c0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: euop2
blocks.content: Transfer existential uniqueness to second member of an ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm euop2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(weu(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(c0, cv(s1))), w0))), weu(s1, w0))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  euxfr2(s0, s1, cop(c0, cv(s1)), w0)
  opex(c0, cv(s1))
  moop2(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm euop2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∃!(s0, ∃(s1,(s0 = < c0, s1 > ∧ w0)))↔ ∃!(s1, w0))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  euxfr2(s0, s1, < c0, s1 >, w0)
  opex(c0, s1)
  moop2(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: opthwiener
blocks.content: Justification theorem for the ordered pair definition in Norbert Wiener, "A simplification of the logic of relations", _Proc. of the Cambridge Philos. Soc_., 1914, vol. 17, pp.387-390. It is also shown as a definition in [Enderton] p. 36 and as Exercise 4.8(b) of [Mendelson] p. 230. It is meaningful only for classes that exist as sets (i.e. are not proper classes). See ~ df-op for other ordered pair definitions. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2003.)

blocks.name: opthhausdorff
blocks.content: Justification theorem for the ordered pair definition of Felix Hausdorff in "Grundzüge der Mengenlehre" ("Basics of Set Theory"), 1914, p. 32: ` <. A , B >. ` _H ` = { { A , O } , { B , T } } ` . Hausdorff used ` 1 ` and ` 2 ` instead of ` O ` and ` T ` , but actually, any two different fixed sets will do (e.g., ` O = (/) ` and ` T = { (/) } ` , see ~ 0nep0 ). Furthermore, Hausdorff demanded that ` O ` and ` T ` are both different from ` A ` as well as ` B ` , which is actually not necessary in full extent ( ` A =/= T ` is not required). This definition is meaningful only for classes ` A ` and ` B ` that exist as sets (i.e. are not proper classes): If ` A ` and ` C ` were different proper classes ( ` A =/= C ` ), then ` { { A , O } , { B , T } } = { { C , O } , { D , T } ` ` <-> { { O } , { B , T } } = { { O } , { D , T } ` is true if ` B = D ` , but ` ( A = C /\ B = D ) ` would be false. See ~ df-op for other ordered pair definitions. (Contributed by AV, 14-Jun-2022.)

blocks.name: opthhausdorff0
blocks.content: Justification theorem for the ordered pair definition of Felix Hausdorff in "Grundzüge der Mengenlehre" ("Basics of Set Theory"), 1914, p. 32: ` <. A , B >. ` _H ` = { { A , O } , { B , T } } ` . Hausdorff used ` 1 ` and ` 2 ` instead of ` O ` and ` T ` , but actually, any two different fixed sets will do (e.g., ` O = (/) ` and ` T = { (/) } ` , see ~ 0nep0 ). Furthermore, Hausdorff demanded that ` O ` and ` T ` are both different from ` A ` as well as ` B ` , which is actually not necessary if all involved classes exist as sets (i.e. are not proper classes), in contrast to ~ opthhausdorff . See ~ df-op for other ordered pair definitions. (Contributed by AV, 12-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:

  preq12b(c2, c3, c4, c1)
  jaoi(wa(wceq(c2, c4), wceq(c3, c1)), wa(wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c3, c4)), wi(wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5))))

blocks.name: iunopeqop
blocks.content: Implication of an ordered pair being equal to an indexed union of singletons of ordered pairs. (Contributed by AV, 20-Sep-2020.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)
blocks.origin:
